xdi2.core.util
Class CopyUtil

java.lang.Object
  xdi2.core.util.CopyUtil

public final class CopyUtil
extends Object

Various utility methods for copying statements between graphs.

Author:
markus

Nested Class Summary
static class CopyUtil.CopyStrategy
          An interface that can determine what to copy and what not.
 
Field Summary
static CopyUtil.CopyStrategy ALLCOPYSTRATEGY
          The default strategy that copies everything.
